briefTitle: Study to Compare QVM149 and Free Triple Combination of Salmeterol/Fluticasone + Tiotropium
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Partially-Blinded, Randomized, 24-Week, Parallel-Group, Non-Inferiority, Open-Label Active Controlled Study to Compare the Efficacy and Safety of QVM149 With a Free Triple Combination of Salmeterol/Fluticasone + Tiotropium in Patients With Uncontrolled Asthma
summary:
The purpose of this trial was to demonstrate that the efficacy of two treatment arms of the fixed-dose combination product QVM149 was non-inferior to the efficacy of the free combination arm of salmeterol/ fluticasone+ tiotropium in uncontrolled moderate to severe asthmatic patients.

The planned duration of treatment in this study was 24 weeks, followed up by a 7-day follow-up period.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Asthma Quality of Life Questionnaire (AQLQ) Total Score
